Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22828809] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=70 μg/ml), B. dysenteriae(MIC=18.75 μg/ml) ;Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=4.7 μg/ml), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=9.38 μg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=37.5 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.22828809] 1.79% hemolysis at 25μg/ml, 5.22% hemolysis at 50μg/ml, 7.92% hemolysis at 100μg/ml, 10.85% hemolysis at 200μg/ml against rabbit red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Shows antimicrobial abilities against microorganisms including Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria, and fungi. Has hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptide diversity in the skin of the torrent frog, Amolops jingdongensis.
Literature.Author: He X, Yang S, Wei L, Liu R, Lai R, Rong M.
